Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class ChangeResource

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.ChangeResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Convertible, LeaderCard
public class ChangeResource
extends java.lang.Object
implements LeaderCard
The LeaderCard that gives the Player the possibility to change an white marble with an other Resource.

    java.lang.String cardID

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void assignTo​(Player player)
    Assign the LeaderCard to a Player.
    boolean canBePlayed()
    Used to check if the Player has the requirements for playing a LeaderCard that he already owns.
    boolean equals​(LeaderCard compare)
    Compare two LeaderCard.
    java.lang.String getClassName()
    Helper method used for deserializing a gson String containing a list of leaderCards
    java.lang.String getID()
    Gets the LeaderCard's ID.
    Resource getPowerResource()
    Gets a Resource that changes by the type of leaderCard: for ExtraDeposit is the placeable, for ChangeResource is the changeable, for Discount is the discount and for ExtraProd is the required resource for produce.
    boolean isEnable()
    Check if the LeaderCard has been played by the Player or not.
    void playCard()
    Set the LeaderCard to enable, wrap the Player with a new player that correctly implements the new abilities and adding him the right amount of victory points.
    void setPlayer​(Player tmp)
    Sets the Player to this LeaderCard

      public java.lang.String cardID

  • Constructor Details

    • ChangeResource

      public ChangeResource​(int victoryPoints, java.lang.String color1, java.lang.String color2, Resource change, java.lang.String cardID)
      Instantiates a new ChangeResource LeaderCard and sets enable to false.
      Parameters:
      victoryPoints - the victory points the LeaderCard gives the Player when played.
      color1 - the color of a DevCard required for being played.
      color2 - the color of a 2 DevCards required for being played.
      change - the Resource in which the new Player can turn the white marbles.
      cardID - the unique id for the card

    • getPowerResource

      public Resource getPowerResource()
      Description copied from interface: LeaderCard
      Gets a Resource that changes by the type of leaderCard: for ExtraDeposit is the placeable, for ChangeResource is the changeable, for Discount is the discount and for ExtraProd is the required resource for produce.
      Specified by:
